pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, July 17, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Montréal, Quebec

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the CEO of Bell Canada, George Cope.

Closed to media.

3:25 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Port of Montreal along with President of the European Council Donald Tusk, European Commissioner for Trade Cecilia Malmström, and Minister of International Trade Diversification Jim Carr.

Maisonneuve Terminal
Port of Montreal

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity for accredited media
  • Accredited media are asked to present themselves at the entrance of section 46 of the Port of Montreal (corner of boulevard Pie-IX and rue Notre-Dame Est) no later than 1:45 p.m., and follow directions to media parking.
  • Accredited media will receive a badge upon arrival.

5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will host a reception in honour of the European Union delegation, and deliver remarks.

Le Salon 1861
550, rue Richmond

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage of opening remarks
